title: A fortnight of dominance as Bitcoin fees continue to surpass Ethereum
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin transaction fees continue to eclipse Ethereum after consistently outperforming for over two weeks. This evolution has raised several important questions about the Bitcoin landscape. With Bitcoin fees reaching a high of $12 million on Dec. 27 and maintaining a steady seven-day average of $11 million, the implications for miners are significant. The largest […]

title: SEC anti-crypto actions founder in 2023 - defeated in 2024?
description: The SEC’s ‘regulation by enforcement’ campaign against crypto has hit the buffers in 2023 as court cases went against them. Will 2024 finally put an end to chairman Gensler and his “lazy and paternalistic” methods of operating?

title: Publicly Listed Bitcoin Miners Soar in 2023 — Marathon Leads With 767% Surge
description: Since the year began, both bitcoin and the broader crypto economy have risen a great deal in value, with bitcoin climbing over 150% since Jan. 1, 2023. title: Baldur’s Gate 3 Xbox Players Face Save Deletion
description: Baldur’s Gate 3, a highly anticipated role-playing game, has finally made its way to Xbox, bringing with it a wave of excitement among players.
